custom-action.name: appdynamics_monitoring
custom-action.description: AppDynamics Monitoring Action will retrieve all the counters specified in AppDynamics. Possible parameters are: - appDynamicsURL (required): AppDynamics URL. Default value is "https://<account_name>.saas.appdynamics.com". - appDynamicsApplicationName (required): AppDynamics application name. - appDynamicsAPIKey (optional): AppDynamics API key. - appDynamicsAccountName (optional): AppDynamics account name. - appDynamicsUserName (optional): AppDynamics user name. - appDynamicsPassword (optional): AppDynamics password. - appDynamicsMetricPaths (required): AppDynamics Metric Paths separated by a line break. Default value is "Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|CPU|User Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|CPU|System Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|CPU|%Idle Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|Memory|* Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|Network|Incoming Errors Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|Network|Outgoing Errors Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|Disks|Reads/sec Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Hardware Resources|Disks|Writes/sec Application Infrastructure Performance|*|Agent|Business Transactions|*". - proxyName (optional): The NeoLoad proxy name to access AppDynamics. - dataExchangeApiUrl (required): The URL of the DataExchange server (located on the NeoLoad Controller). Default value is "http://localhost:7400/DataExchange/v1/Service.svc/". - dataExchangeApiKey (optional): Identification key specified in NeoLoad for DataExchange server.
